sect1.title: Command Line Reference
sect1.para: This section provides a reference manual for the Command Line Interface. Modules and actions are listed in tables of the following structure:

row.entry: Expected format of the standard input. Standard input is mandatory, unless footnotes say otherwise.
Details about the parameter. Parameters are optional, unless footnotes say otherwise.
Details about the flag. All flags are optional.
Output line synopsis or XML format definition.
Output synopsis. Listed only when the error output is used for a purpose other than error reporting.

sect1.para: The reference manual for each module is followed by a subsection with lots of command line examples and comments. BEEN gurus can skip these subsections, since the reference manual is all they need. Users unfamiliar with XML Schema will find a couple of informal, yet fairly complete examples of XML input and output data used by some actions.
